As TALON and STRAIGHT SHOT talked, seeming to argue over who had the
greatest blame and who should go into the jaws of certain death, LEO
PRIME stood behind LEGACY as he worked on the scans that the Ark had
so recently taken.

Finally LEGACY looked up. "I cannot trace the destination of the
bridge because it is not a space bridge in the typical sense. It does
transfer from one mechanical apature to another, but rather it creates
a temporary energized one and transfers from one in a manner I am not
accustomed to."

LEGACY tilted his head as he continued his scan, "The distances this
bridge could reached would not be great, perhaps planet wide only but
it would cost signifigantly less in energy to use."

LEO turned to look at STRAIGHT SHOT, "In the last report you guys sent
back didn't the Predacons recover a device that DARK RODIMUS used
during his transport?"

LEGACY nodded, "I have read the report. If that is a controller of
some type for this bridge network and we had access to this a device I
might be able to use it to scan for its home source."

(TAG)

Preston



> Talon:
>
> "Same with you"said Talon
